members.member: Creates and displays the error message.

member.name: P:BaseClases.ExCheckedListBox.DataSource
member.summary:
Gets or sets the data source for this CustomControls.CheckedListBox. Returns: An object that implements the System.Collections.IList or System.ComponentModel.IListSource interfaces, such as a System.Data.DataSet or an System.Array. The default is null.
Exceptions: System.ArgumentException: The assigned value does not implement the System.Collections.IList or System.ComponentModel.IListSource interfaces.

member.name: P:BaseClases.ExCheckedListBox.Value
member.summary: Gets and sets an integer value based on checked items(bitwise)
